Package io.soliton.protobuf

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Client
    High-level formalization of the client-side of the RPC system.
    ClientLogger
    Hook interface to allow plugging-in an arbitrary white-box monitoring framework in Piezo.
    ClientMethod<O>
    Represents a method on the client side of the RPC system.
    ControlOrBuilder  
    EnvelopeOrBuilder  
    Server
    High-level formalization of the server-side of the RPC system.
    ServerLogger
    Hook interface to allow plugging-in an arbitrary white-box monitoring framework in Piezo.
    ServerMethod<I,O>
    Represents a method on the server side of the RPC system.
    Service
    Represents an RPC service as defined in a .proto file.
    ServiceGroup
    A container of Service instances, used by a Server to maintain the set of active services.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractRpcServer
    Provides a default implementation of Server which binds to a TCP port.
    ChannelInitializers
    Utility methods pertaining to ChannelInitializers.
    Control
    Protobuf type soliton.piezo.Control
    Control.Builder
    Protobuf type soliton.piezo.Control
    DefaultServiceGroup
    Default implementation of ServiceGroup.
    Envelope
    Protobuf type soliton.piezo.Envelope
    Envelope.Builder
    Protobuf type soliton.piezo.Envelope
    EnvelopeClientHandler<I,O>
    Base class for client-side RPC handlers that encode RPC calls in an Envelope.
    EnvelopeFuture<V extends Message>
    A implementation of ListenableFuture tailored to handle responses encoded as an Envelope message.
    EnvelopeServerHandler<I,O>
    Shared server-side handler implementation for servers whose method calls are encoded using an Envelope message.
    NullClientLogger
    A null-object implementation of ClientLogger.
    NullServerLogger
    A null-object implementation of the ServerLogger interface.
    Piezo  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    EnvelopeClientHandler.ResponseConversionException
    Occurs when a received response couldn't be converted into an Envelope.
    EnvelopeServerHandler.RequestConversionException
    Occurs when an incoming request couldn't be converted into an envelope.
